options.optionText: So... how are you holding up with everyone going full-on primal out there?
options.responseText: Hah! I am untouched by this filth! You see, they are slaves to their basest desires. But I, I am on the verge of enlightenment! My power is growing!

followUpOptions.optionText: Dude, you're sweating through your pants. You sure you're not about to explode like the rest of them?
followUpOptions.responseText: This sweat is a sign of my imminent transcendence! The tension is my fuel, and I am pushing the limits of what the body can endure! I am... UNBREAKABLE!

followUpOptions.optionText: Sounds to me like you’re just one bad thought away from completely losing it.
followUpOptions.responseText: You doubt me? Ha! I am the Edge Lord! You think these mortals rolling around in their filth can shake me?

followUpOptions.optionText: Yeah, and I bet your 'ascension' involves locking yourself in a bathroom real soon.
followUpOptions.responseText: Mock me all you want, plebeian! Soon, when I achieve my final form, you will grovel at the feet of my restraint!

options.optionText: What exactly happens when you 'ascend' anyway? Glowing? Floating? Maybe a pair of wings?
options.responseText: When I ascend, I will no longer be constrained by the limits of the flesh! I will become pure energy— a being of sheer willpower, uncorrupted by desire! I’ll be able to... to… resist… anything!

followUpOptions.optionText: Right. And you'll just float above everyone, watching them get busy while you're... well, just watching?
followUpOptions.responseText: Watching? Pah! I will be above such things! While they rut like animals, I will be soaring the cosmos! I'll no longer be tied down by... by... dammit, it's getting really hot in here!

followUpOptions.optionText: Wait, pure energy? So, you're saying... no more *ahem* needs at all? You sure that's what you want?
followUpOptions.responseText: It is the ultimate goal! To be beyond such weakness! To— to... wait... wait, maybe I didn’t think this through...

followUpOptions.optionText: Yeah, that's what I thought. You’ll be floating around, bored out of your mind. Forever.
followUpOptions.responseText: Bored? I, the Edge Lord, bored? Impossible! I will have... endless... strength! Right? RIGHT?!

followUpOptions.optionText: You'd miss the fun, Edge Lord. All work and no play makes you a... pretty uptight guy.
followUpOptions.responseText: No... no, you're wrong! I don’t need... fun. Fun is for the weak! It’s... I mean... maybe just a little fun wouldn’t hurt...

options.optionText: Have you... um... ascended yet? Or still just edging?
options.responseText: I am on the very brink! So close! One more test... just a little more... I can feel the power surging through me!

followUpOptions.optionText: Wow. You're really pushing it. But at this rate, aren't you worried you'll... uh... 'ascend' right in front of everyone?
followUpOptions.responseText: Nonsense! I have perfect control! I will ascend when I choose! I am the master of my own release! Wait... not like that... you know what I mean!

followUpOptions.optionText: Let me guess, one more 'session' and you'll unlock god mode, huh?
followUpOptions.responseText: EXACTLY! One more test of my endurance, and I will transcend to a higher plane! I will be untouchable, unshakable... ahh, so much power! So much tension!

options.responseText: Hah! Run along, mortal. While you waste your energy, I shall continue my path to godhood!
